title: Payments; lapse of unexpended funds
context: [ยง89E-6] Payments; lapse of unexpended funds. After payments of all costs associated with the severance benefits and special retirement benefits, the public employer&rsquo;s remaining payroll balances shall not be expended for any purpose and shall be lapsed into the appropriate fund. [L Sp 2016 2d, c 1, pt of ยง2]
